portfolioPage.portfolioSubtitle: I enjoy creating interfaces that are both pleasant and easy to use. Below are projects or individual components I’ve developed — all part of my professional journey.
portfolioPage.itemTitle1: Slider for the homepage of a pet photographer’s website.
portfolioPage.itemDescription1: Responsive slider plementation with a custom design based on Figma layouts for a WordPress website. The slider was built using Swiper.js via CDN, without adding local files to the project. Each slide includes a background image and a customizable background color or gradient, both of which can be configured through the WordPress admin panel, using the Helium theme.
portfolioPage.itemDescription2: A responsive authentication page with switchable login and registration views, built using React (frontend) and Java (backend). Integrated with a REST API for user authentication and registration. Implemented seamless switching between login and signup forms without page reloads. Used Formik for form state management and client-side validation with user-friendly error handling. Prepared for secure token-based authentication.
portfolioPage.itemMvkfz: Landing page for an automotive key specialist.
portfolioPage.itemDescriptionMvkfz: MV_KFZ Autoschlüssel is a multilingual one-page website for a specialist in the production and repair of car keys. The project and design were developed from scratch with a focus on fast loading, SEO optimization, and simple order submission via Telegram. Users can quickly submit a request through the website form, and the owner instantly receives a notification via a Telegram bot.
portfolioPage.itemDescriptionCutly: This is a mobile application for smart meal planning using artificial intelligence. The app uses the following technologies: Frontend: React Native (Expo), TypeScript; Backend / BaaS: Supabase (Auth, Database, Storage); State management: Zustand / Redux; AI: OpenAI / Gemini (menu and recipe generation).

cutlyPage.seoDescription: Smart meal planning with AI: menus, recipes, and shopping lists in seconds.
cutlyPage.subtitle: Cutly is your personal assistant. Plan meals, create menus and shopping lists in seconds.
cutlyPage.description: Cutly is a mobile app for smart meal planning powered by artificial intelligence. It helps users quickly create a menu for a day or a week, selecting dishes based on diet, allergies, taste preferences, and region, and also generates a shopping list for the chosen meals. The app is multilingual and at launch supports English, German, Ukrainian, and Russian.

cutlyPage.privacyText: We respect your privacy and aim to protect your personal data. Cutly collects only the data necessary for the app to function properly. Users can delete their account and associated data at any time.
cutlyPage.accountText: Users can request account deletion directly inside the app. After deletion, all related personal data will be permanently removed.
cutlyPage.developerText: Cutly is developed as an independent project focused on convenience, transparency, and modern technologies. Feedback and suggestions are always welcome.
